title: Anjana Anjana Lyrics Vandhaan Vendraan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Aaalaap Raju
Lyrics: Yugabharathi 
Song: Anjana Anjana 
Movie: Vandhaan Vendraan
Music: Thaman S

Indru mudhalthaan pudhithaanen
Un Iniya siripinil mugil aanen
Kottum mazhai pol sugam aanen
Un Konjum udhatinil tamil aanen
Un Konjum udhatinil tamil aanen

Anjana Anjana anbe anbe Anjana
Un otrai paarvai podhum anjana
Anjana Anjana illai nane Anjana
Nanum neeyaai aanen Anjana

Ah podu podu, ah thandhanathom podu
Ne andharathil aadu, Ah thulli vizhayaadu
Ah thottu thottu paadu,edhuku kattupaadu
Ne vandhu vandhu thaedu,ah kata kata sudu
Ne mutti mutti moodu, pakkathil ennai naadu
Unadhu vizhiyodu ennai marandhene

Unnmaiyaanen.., Unnmaiyaanen,.Unnai pole .. anmaiyaanen..
Venmaiyaanen.. Venmaiyaanen..Mella naanum thanmaiyaanen..

Kadhal kadhal vandhale, Thaneerum kooda thee pole
Thannaale maarum manmele, sandhosam koodum nenjulle
Aagayam undhan kal kele, poo kolam podum panbaale
Vedhaalam ondru unnulle, Vizhyaadi pogum cell-nulle ...

Oru chinna paarvayil,
Nan Nan viduthalai viduthalai adaindhene
Unadhu anbu vaarthayil
Naan piraviyin payanayum arindheney....

Ye kelu kelu,ne ennavendru kelu
Ne eppozhudhum kelu,Nan solluvathai kelu
Sollaadhadhayum kelu, Nerungi vandhu kelu
Unadharugil mozhiyaai varuvene..
Unnmaiyaanen...., Unnmaiyaanen,...

Siragu illaiyaayinum, 
naan iragena iragena parandhene
kanavillai aayinum,
nan mulluvadhum mulluvadhum kalaindhene

Ye paaru paaru, ah pakkam vandhu paaru
Ne paadi paaadi paaru, ah pathirama paadu
Paadharasam paaru, padhukavillai paaru,
Sila nodigalil ennai naan tharuvene...

Unnmaiyaanen.., Unnmaiyaanen, Unnai pole, anmaiyaanen,
Venmaiyaanen.. Venmaiyaanen..Mella naanum thanmaiyaanen

Kadhal kadhal vandhale, Thaneerum kooda thee pole
Thannaale maarum manmele, sandhosam koodum nenjulle
Aagayam undhan kal kele, poo kolam podum panbaale
Vedhaalam ondru unnulle, Vizhyaadi pogum cell-nulle ...

Anjana Anjana illai nane Anjana ..



Vandhaan Vendraan Lyrics
Anjana Anjana by Aalaap Raju Nagaruthe Nagaruthe by Thaman SKanchana Mala by Karthilk, Priya HimeshThirandhen Thirendhen by Shreya Ghosal, Aalaap Raju
